docs.text: GA4GH-VA-Spec None URI: https://w3id.org/ga4gh Classes Class Description Element The base definition for all elements that comprise the model (classes, complex data types, value sets) Entity Anything that exists, has existed, or will exist. InformationEntity An abstract (non-physical) entity that is about something. DataItem An InformationEntity representing an individual piece of data, generated/acquired through methods which reliably produce truthful information about something. DataSet A collection of related data items or records that are organized together in a common format or structure, to enable their computational manipulation as a unit. Document A collection of information, usually in human-readable form, intended to be read and understood together as a whole. Statement An information entity expressing a declarative sentence that is either true or false. StudyResult A collection of select data items from a single study that are about a particular subject or experimental unit within the study - including provenance metadata describing how this data was generated. EvidenceLine A discrete, independent argument relevant to the validity of the Proposition put forth as true in the Statement, that is based on the interpretation of one or more pieces of information as evidence. Method A set of instructions that specify how to achieve some objective (e.g. study/experimental protocols, curation guidelines, rule sets, etc.) Activity An action or set of actions performed by an agent, that occurs over a period of time. Activities may use, generate, modify, move, or destroy one or more entities. ResearchStudy An activity that applies a defined methodological approach to interrogate a specific set of subjects, and generate data that is analyzed and interpreted to answer a particular research question (typically the validation or generation of hypothesis) Contribution The actions taken by a particular agent in the creation, modification, assessment, or deprecation of some entity (e.g. a Statement, Evidence Line, Data Item, Publication, etc.) Agent An autonomous actor (person, organization, or computational agent) that bears some form of responsibility for an activity taking place, for the existence of an entity, or for another agent‚Äôs activity. Proposition An abstract entity representing the sharable meaning that can be put forth as true in a Statement made by an Agent. Affiliation A relationship between an Agent and a Group or Organization to which they belong or belonged. Descriptor An object that wraps a value object in order to transfer additional, non-definitional information about it. VariationDescriptor None Coding A structured representation of a coded/enumerated data value, that includes additional metadata about the code and code system. Expression A structure for labels representing systematic expressions that describe an entity, as generated by formal nomenclatures (e.g. HGVS for genetic variants, ISCN for karyotypes, HLA nomenclature for HLA genes/alleles). Extension A data structure that allows implementations to define and create custom fields within an Entity to capture information not supported by the core specification. RecordMetadata A re-usable structure that encapsulates provenance metadata that applies to a specific concrete record/encoding of information, as opposed to provenance of the abstract information content/knowledge the record represents. Variation A representation of the state of one or more biomolecules. GeneticCondition A disease, or a set of one or more co-occurring phenotypes, controlled by genetic factors with a defined inheritance pattern. TherapeuticIntervention A type of treatment administered/prescribed to a patient to prevent, ameliorate, or cure a medical condition. Gene A region (or regions) that includes all of the sequence elements necessary to encode a functional transcript. A gene may include regulatory regions, transcribed regions and/or other functional sequence regions. SequenceLocation A specified subsequence of a reference Sequence. The reference is typically a chromosome, transcript, or protein sequence. URI: vaspec:InformationEntity Inheritance Element Entity InformationEntity DataItem DataSet Document Statement StudyResult EvidenceLine Method Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info isAbout Entity 0..* An entity or concept in the world that the information entity describes/is about. . qualifiedContribution Contribution 0..* A specific contribution made by some Agent to the creation, modification, or validation of the information represented in the Information Entity. . dateAuthored dateTime 0..1 The date the information content expressed in this entity was generated. . wasSpecifiedBy Method 0..* A plan specification that describes all or part of the process through which the information was generated. . derivedFrom InformationEntity 0..* An information resource from which the Information Entity is derived, in whole or in part . wasOutputOf Activity 0..* An activity that generated the Entity. . hasPart InformationEntity 0..* Any part of the Information Entity (e.g. individual value or record from a larger data set, a section of a larger document) . partOf InformationEntity 0..* A larger Information Entity of which the present Information Entity is a part. . isReportedIn Document 0..* A document in which the information content carried by the Information Entity is expressed . confidenceLevel Coding 0..1 A qualitative term describing of degree of docs.text: Class: Proposition An abstract entity representing the sharable meaning that can be put forth as true in a Statement made by an Agent. docs.text: Class: RecordMetadata A re-usable structure that encapsulates provenance metadata that applies to a specific concrete record/encoding of information, as opposed to provenance of the abstract information content/knowledge the record represents. URI: vaspec:RecordMetadata Inheritance Element RecordMetadata Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info description ga4ghString 0..1 A free text description of the RecordMetadata object. . recordIdentifier identifier 0..1 The identifier of the described record in its home system/dataset. Use a business identifier, structured as a CURIE, where possible (as opposed to an internal logical identifier valid only in the context of the source system). . partOfDataset DataSet 0..1 The dataset of which the described record is a part. . recordVersion ga4ghString 0..1 The version number of the record-level artifact the object describes . previousVersion ga4ghString 0..1 The version of a record in the same system that the current record replaces/follows. . dateRecordCreated dateTime 0..1 The date the record was initially created. . dateRecordLastModified dateTime 0..1 The date the record was last edited/updated/modified to its present concrete form. . qualifiedContribution Contribution 0..* Links to a 'Contribution' object allowing richer representation of specific types of contributions made by an agent to the creation, modification, or administrative management of a record. . recordURL url 0..* A web address where the entity is found or described. . xref ga4ghString 0..* A cross-reference linking to an identifier for an entity/record that represents the same or a closely related concepts or knowledge as the present record. . extension Extension 0..* None . docs.text: Class: Statement An information entity expressing a declarative sentence that is either true or false. URI: vaspec:Statement Inheritance Element Entity InformationEntity Statement Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info statementType Coding 0..* A more specific type of Statement about a genetic variation (e.g. a Variant Pathogenicity Statement, or Molecular Consequence Statement) . subject Entity 1..1 The Entity about which the Statement is made. . predicate Coding 1..1 The relationship asserted to hold between the subject and the object of the Statement. . object Element 1..1 An Entity, concept, or value that is related to the subject of a Statement via its predicate. . qualifier Element 0..* A value or concept that extends or refines the meaning of the claim expressed in the core subject - predicate - object 'triple' - e.g. by providing additional information/detail, or constraining the claim to apply in a particular context. . assertedProposition Proposition 0..1 The possible fact (proposition) that the Statement puts forth as true. . negated ga4ghBoolean 0..1 A boolean flag set to 'true' if the statement expressed by the subject, predicate, object, and qualifier(s) is explicitly asserted to be false. . evidenceLevel Coding 0..1 A term indicating the overall strength of support for the Statement based on all evidence assessed. . evidenceScore DataItem 0..1 A quantitative score reflecting the overall strength of support for the Statement based on all evidence assessed. . hasEvidence_Line EvidenceLine 0..* A discrete, independent argument relevant to the validity of the Proposition put forth as true in the Statement, that is based on the interpretation of one or more pieces of information as evidence. . hasEvidence InformationEntity 0..* A piece of information that represents or contributes to an argument for or against the validity of a Statement. . hasEvidenceOfType Coding 0..* A term describing a type of evidence used to support a Statement (e.g. 'sequence similarity evidence', 'in vitro assay evidence') - as opposed to instances of evidence information such as a specific data value, or prior assertions, etc. . hasEvidenceFromSource InformationEntity 0..* An Information Entity (typically a publication, dataset, or database) that reports information interpreted as evidence to make the Statement. . subjectDescriptor Descriptor 0..1 A collection of additional metadata about the subject of the Statement's proposition, that cannot represented in its value object based representation, but may be useful for understanding and use of the subject entity (e.g. labels, xrefs, aliases, and other subjective/context specific information) . objectDescriptor Descriptor 0..1 A collection of additional metadata about the object of the Statement's proposition, that cannot represented in its value object based representation, but may be useful for understanding and use of the subject entity (e.g. labels, xrefs, aliases, and other subjective/context specific information) . qualifierDescriptor Descriptor 0..* A collection of additional metadata about an entity/concept that qualifies the Statement's proposition. This additional metadata cannot represented in its value object based representation, but may be useful for understanding and use of the subject entity (e.g. labels, xrefs, aliases, and other subjective/context specific information) . isAbout Entity 0..* None . qualifiedContribution Contribution 0..* None . dateAuthored dateTime 0..1 None . wasSpecifiedBy Method 0..* None . derivedFrom InformationEntity 0..* None . wasOutputOf Activity 0..* None . hasPart InformationEntity 0..* None . partOf InformationEntity 0..* None . isReportedIn Document 0..* None . confidenceLevel Coding 0..1 None . confidenceScore DataItem 0..1 None . version ga4ghString 0..1 None . license ga4ghString 0..1 None . id identifier 1..1 None . identifier identifier 0..* None . type ga4ghClass 1..1 None . label ga4ghString 0..1 None . alternativeLabel ga4ghString 0..* None . description ga4ghString 0..1 None . url url 0..* None . reference InformationEntity 0..* None . xref ga4ghString 0..* None . thisRecordMeta RecordMetadata 0..1 None . sourceRecordMeta RecordMetadata 0..* None . extension Extension 0..* None . Usages Identifier and Mapping Information

docs.text: Class: StudyResult A collection of select data items from a single study that are about a particular subject or experimental unit within the study - including provenance metadata describing how this data was generated. URI: vaspec:StudyResult Inheritance Element Entity InformationEntity StudyResult Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info studyResultType Coding 0..* A more specific type of study result this object may represent (e.g. an 'Allele Frequency Study Result') . focus Entity 0..* The specific subject, concept, or experimental unit in the Research Study that data in the Result is about. The focus guides the selection of data that is included within a single Study Result object. . Data_Item DataItem 0..* A piece of data from the source Study that is included in the Result, and pertains to the entity that is the 'focus'. Can be data directly about the focus, or metadata relevant to how this data was generated. . interpretation Coding 0..1 A qualitative interpretation of the lower-level data item(s) included in the result (e.g. that a result is high, normal, or low). . sourceDataSet DataSet 0..* A larger Data Set from which the content of the Result was derived. . sourceStudy ResearchStudy 0..1 The Study that generated the date reported in the Result. . sourceStudyType Coding 0..1 The type of study that produced the result (e.g. 'allele population frequency study', 'computational functional impact prediction', 'protein functional assay', 'randomized clinical trial') . sourceStudyDate dateTime 0..1 The date the study from which the Result was derived was performed. . sourceStudyMethod Method 0..* A plan specification that describes all or part of the process that created the information (e.g. interpretation guidelines, rule sets, etc.). . isAbout Entity 0..* None . qualifiedContribution Contribution 0..* None . dateAuthored dateTime 0..1 None . wasSpecifiedBy Method 0..* None . derivedFrom InformationEntity 0..* None . wasOutputOf Activity 0..* None . hasPart InformationEntity 0..* None . partOf InformationEntity 0..* None . isReportedIn Document 0..* None . confidenceLevel Coding 0..1 None . confidenceScore DataItem 0..1 None . version ga4ghString 0..1 None . license ga4ghString 0..1 None . id identifier 1..1 None . identifier identifier 0..* None . type ga4ghClass 1..1 None . label ga4ghString 0..1 None . alternativeLabel ga4ghString 0..* None . description ga4ghString 0..1 None . url url 0..* None . reference InformationEntity 0..* None . xref ga4ghString 0..* None . thisRecordMeta RecordMetadata 0..1 None . sourceRecordMeta RecordMetadata 0..* None . extension Extension 0..* None . Usages Identifier and Mapping Information
